        protected String convertComplexStatement(String sqlStatement)
        Converts Decode and Outer Join. 
                DECODE (a, 1, 'one', 2, 'two', 'none')
         => CASE WHEN a = 1 THEN 'one' WHEN a = 2 THEN 'two' ELSE 'none' END
